Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.view.CLI.printables

Class ANSI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.view.CLI.printables.ANSI
public class ANSI
extends Object
This class makes UNICODE escape characters available through functions and variables that have easy to understand names.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static String BG_color​(int colorCode)
    Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 8-bit background color.
    static String BG_rgbColor​(int r, int g, int b)
    Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 24-bit background color based on its rgb value.
    static void clearArea​(int startLine, int startColumn, int endLine, int endColumn)
    Clears the area of th console defined by given coordinates.
    static void clearColumnInterval​(int column, int startLine, int endLine)
    Clears characters from line startLine to line endLine at given column.
    static void clearLine()
    Clears the entire line at which the cursor is.
    static void clearLineInterval​(int line, int startColumn, int endColumn)
    Clears characters from column startColumn to column endColumn at given line.
    static void clearScreen()
    Clears the screen and moves the terminal cursor to the top left angle (1,1).
    static String FG_color​(int colorCode)
    Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 8-bit foreground color.
    static String FG_rgbColor​(int r, int g, int b)
    Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 24-bit foreground color based on its rgb value.
    static void hideCursor()
    Hides the terminal cursor.
    static void moveHorizontal​(int columns)
    Moves the terminal cursor horizontally
    static void moveTo​(int line, int column)
    Moves the terminal cursor to the given line and column.
    static void moveVertical​(int lines)
    Moves the terminal cursor vertically.
    static void showCursor()
    Shows the terminal cursor.

  • Constructor Details

    • ANSI

      public ANSI()

  • Method Details

    • moveVertical

      public static void moveVertical​(int lines)
      Moves the terminal cursor vertically.
      Parameters:
      lines - number of line to move the cursor. Positive numbers will move the cursor downwards, negative numbers wil move the cursor upwards.

    • moveHorizontal

      public static void moveHorizontal​(int columns)
      Moves the terminal cursor horizontally
      Parameters:
      columns - number of columns to move the cursor. Positive numbers will move the cursor rightwards, negative numbers wil move the cursor leftwards.

    • moveTo

      public static void moveTo​(int line, int column)
      Moves the terminal cursor to the given line and column. The values are 1-based.
      Parameters:
      line - Line to move to
      column - Column to move to

    • clearScreen

      public static void clearScreen()
      Clears the screen and moves the terminal cursor to the top left angle (1,1).

    • hideCursor

      public static void hideCursor()
      Hides the terminal cursor.

    • showCursor

      public static void showCursor()
      Shows the terminal cursor.

    • clearLine

      public static void clearLine()
      Clears the entire line at which the cursor is. Cursor position doesn't change.

    • clearLineInterval

      public static void clearLineInterval​(int line, int startColumn, int endColumn)
      Clears characters from column startColumn to column endColumn at given line. After execution the cursor is in position (line, startColumn).
      Parameters:
      line - line to be erased.
      startColumn - column to startColumn clearing from.
      endColumn - last column to be cleared.

    • clearColumnInterval

      public static void clearColumnInterval​(int column, int startLine, int endLine)
      Clears characters from line startLine to line endLine at given column. After execution the cursor is in position (startLine, column).
      Parameters:
      column - column to be erased.
      startLine - line to startLine clearing from.
      endLine - last line to be cleared.

    • clearArea

      public static void clearArea​(int startLine, int startColumn, int endLine, int endColumn)
      Clears the area of th console defined by given coordinates. After execution the cursor is in position (startLine, startColumn).
      Parameters:
      startLine - Line of the top left character of the area.
      startColumn - Column of the top left character of the area.
      endLine - Line of the bottom right character of the area.
      endColumn - Column of the bottom right character of the area.

    • FG_color

      public static String FG_color​(int colorCode)
      Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 8-bit foreground color.
      Parameters:
      colorCode - Code of the 8-bit color.
      Returns:
      ANSI escape sequence of the wanted 8-bit color.

    • BG_color

      public static String BG_color​(int colorCode)
      Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 8-bit background color.
      Parameters:
      colorCode - Code of the 8-bit color.
      Returns:
      ANSI escape sequence of the wanted 8-bit color.

    • FG_rgbColor

      public static String FG_rgbColor​(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 24-bit foreground color based on its rgb value.
      Parameters:
      r - r value of the color.
      g - g value of the color.
      b - b value of the color.
      Returns:
      ANSI escape sequence of the wanted 24-bit color.

    • BG_rgbColor

      public static String BG_rgbColor​(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates the correct ANSI escape sequence for a 24-bit background color based on its rgb value.
      Parameters:
      r - r value of the color.
      g - g value of the color.
      b - b value of the color.
      Returns:
      ANSI escape sequence of the wanted 24-bit color.
